"What causes Ehlers-Danlos syndrome, dermatosparaxis type ?","What causes Ehlers-Danlos syndrome, dermatosparaxis type? Ehlers-Danlos syndrome (EDS), dermatosparaxis type is caused by changes (mutations) in the ADAMTS2 gene. This gene encodes an enzyme that helps process several types of ""procollagen molecules"" (precursors of collagen). Collagen is a protein that provides structure and strength to connective tissues throughout the body.
